name: Kindling (Raining Sideways)
description:
Navigate a simple dating sim in the world of modern technology and find out who people really are behind their digital representations. This game was made at the VGDC 2018 game jam, the theme for which was It's Not What You Think. 

The music was made using samples and loops found in the Music Maker library.

I made everything but the cover art. Model credits to Brian Craig and Charlie Mackin.

Main Theme: https://soundcloud.com/raining-sideways/kindling-main-theme

The Reveal : https://soundcloud.com/raining-sideways/the-reveal
